snippet: Europe‘s banks still fear U.S. punishment if they enter Iran. Iranians ask if they’ve been betrayed. The president must rule out prosecution. Now.

byline.original: By SEYED HOSSEIN MOUSAVIAN and REZA NASRI

lead_paragraph: Europe‘s banks still fear U.S. punishment if they enter Iran. Iranians ask if they’ve been betrayed. The president must rule out prosecution. Now.

headline.print_headline: Obama Needs to Protect the Iran Deal
headline.main: Obama Needs to Protect the Iran Deal
